title: Supply Task Prioritization Framework and Dashboard
example_bullets: Designed and deployed a multi-metric task prioritization system that increased focus on critical supply issues by 25% through data-driven ranking and team training.

Established a task prioritization framework using multi-variable metrics (hotel vs. ticket scores) and trained supply teams on the new dashboard, driving a 25% increase in the resolution of critical tasks.

core.problem: Supply teams lacked a structured, data-driven system to prioritize high-impact hotel and ticket issues.
actions: Defined multi-variable business metrics incorporating hotel and ticket scores
Built a task prioritization framework to rank supply issues
Developed a dashboard to operationalize the prioritization logic
Trained supply teams on adoption and usage of the new system
results: Increased resolution of critical tasks by 25%
constraints: Large and diverse supply issue backlog
Need for operational adoption across teams

title: Room-Type Mismatch Detection Using SQL and NLP
example_bullets: Engineered an AI-driven solution for room-type mismatch detection, leveraging Python and SQL for large-scale data processing and applying NLP techniques (TF-IDF, Levenshtein Distance) to preprocess text, which boosted detection rates by 120%.
Refined dynamic pricing accuracy by combining large-scale SQL analysis with NLP techniques (lemmatization, TF-IDF, edit distance) to detect room-type mismatches, increasing detection by 120%.

core.problem: Room-type mismatches between listings caused pricing inaccuracies and availability errors.
actions: Extracted large-scale listing data using SQL
Applied NLP techniques including lemmatization, TF-IDF, and edit distance (Levenshtein)
Built matching logic to detect inconsistencies between room descriptions
Validated detection performance against existing rules
results: Reduced downstream pricing and availability errors
